content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Wang. I'm sure you'll find it to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking for a fair price, Mr. Schmidt. The location and condition of the apartment are very appealing, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How much do you normally charge for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Ms. Wang, I'm always open to fair offers. Since the apartment is brand new and in a prime location, I typically look for a rent that reflects its value. However, I'm willing to negotiate with you if you believe my asking price is not in line with the market. What is your understanding of the going rate for a similar apartment in the area?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, I'm watching my budget carefully. I've seen similar apartments in the area for around 800 Euro per month. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to this range?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 800 Euro per month is certainly a price point I would consider, especially for a student tenant. However, since my apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, it might be slightly higher than that. Can you propose a specific amount that you would be comfortable paying?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay 825 Euro per month, including all utilities. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, considering the apartment's condition and location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 825 Euro per month, including utilities, is quite compelling. While it is slightly lower than my initial expectation, I'm willing to accept this price, given your student status and the current market conditions. I agree to the price of 825 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be a great place for you to study and live. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Your willingness to negotiate has been very reasonable. I appreciate the opportunity to rent such a lovely apartment. I don't have any further questions at this time. Let's proceed with finalizing the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
